00054 Option::Option(bool set)
00055     : myAmSet(set), myHaveTheDefaultValue(true), myAmWritable(true) {}
00056 
00057 
00058 Option::Option(const Option& s)
00059     : myAmSet(s.myAmSet), myHaveTheDefaultValue(s.myHaveTheDefaultValue),
00060       myAmWritable(s.myAmWritable) {}
00061 
00062 
00063 Option::~Option() {}
00064 
00065 
00066 Option&
00067 Option::operator=(const Option& s) {
00068     if (this == &s) {
00069         return *this;
00070     }
00071     myAmSet = s.myAmSet;
00072     myHaveTheDefaultValue = s.myHaveTheDefaultValue;
00073     myAmWritable = s.myAmWritable;
00074     return *this;
00075 }

00114 bool
00115 Option::markSet() {
00116     bool ret = myAmWritable;
00117     myHaveTheDefaultValue = false;
00118     myAmSet = true;
00119     myAmWritable = false;
00120     return ret;
00121 }

00199 Option_Integer::operator=(const Option_Integer& s) {
00200     if (this == &s) {

00210 Option_Integer::getInt() const {

00214 
00215 bool
00216 Option_Integer::set(const std::string& v) {
00217     try {
00218         myValue = TplConvert<char>::_2int(v.c_str());
00219         return markSet();
00220     } catch (...) {
00221         std::string s = "'" + v + "' is not a valid integer (should be).";
00222         throw InvalidArgument(s);
00223     }
00224 }
00225 
00226 
00227 std::string
00228 Option_Integer::getValueString() const {
00229     std::ostringstream s;
00230     s << myValue;
00231     return s.str();
00232 }

00331 
00332 bool
00333 Option_Float::set(const std::string& v) {
00334     try {
00335         std::cout << "Value received in Option.set(): " << v.c_str() << "\n";
00336         myValue = TplConvert<char>::_2SUMOReal(v.c_str());
00337         return markSet();
00338     } catch (...) {
00339         std::string s = "'" + v + "' is not a valid float (should be).";
00340         throw InvalidArgument(s);
00341     }
00342 }

00347     std::ostringstream s;
00348     s << myValue;
00349     return s.str();
00350 }

00393 
00394 
00395 bool
00396 Option_Bool::set(const std::string& v) {
00397     std::string value = v;
00398     std::transform(value.begin(), value.end(), value.begin(), tolower);
00399     if (value == "1" || value == "yes" || value == "true" || value == "on" || value == "x") {
00400         myValue = true;
00401     } else if (value == "0" || value == "no" || value == "false" || value == "off") {
00402         myValue = false;
00403     } else {
00404         throw ProcessError("Invalid boolean value for option.");
00405     }
00406     return markSet();
00407 }
00408 
00409 
00410 std::string
00411 Option_Bool::getValueString() const {
00412     if (myValue) {
00413         return "true";
00414     }
00415     return "false";
00416 }
00417 
00418 
00419 bool
00420 Option_Bool::isBool() const {
00421     return true;
00422 }

00487     myValue = s.myValue;
00488     return (*this);

00491 
00492 const IntVector&
00493 Option_IntVector::getIntVector() const {
00494     return myValue;
00495 }
00496 
00497 
00498 bool
00499 Option_IntVector::set(const std::string& v) {
00500     myValue.clear();
00501     try {
00502         if (v.find(';') != std::string::npos) {
00503             WRITE_WARNING("Please note that using ';' as list separator is deprecated.\n From 1.0 onwards, only ',' will be accepted.");
00504         }
00505         StringTokenizer st(v, ";,", true);
00506         while (st.hasNext()) {
00507             myValue.push_back(TplConvert<char>::_2int(st.next().c_str()));
00508         }
00509         return markSet();
00510     } catch (EmptyData&) {
00511         throw InvalidArgument("Empty element occured in " + v);
00512     } catch (...) {
00513         throw InvalidArgument("'" + v + "' is not a valid integer vector.");
00514     }
00515 }
00516 
00517 
00518 std::string
00519 Option_IntVector::getValueString() const {
00520     std::ostringstream s;
00521     for (IntVector::const_iterator i = myValue.begin(); i != myValue.end(); i++) {
00522         if (i != myValue.begin()) {
00523             s << ',';
00524         }
00525         s << (*i);
00526     }
00527     return s.str();
00528 }
